product_id.description: The product ID this price was generated for

variant_id.description: The (optional) variant ID this price was generated for

options.description: The optional product option configuration this price was generated for

option_id.description: The ID of the option configured for this price

value_id.description: The selected value ID for the configured option.

retail_price.description: The price for a product including estimates for tax

as_entered.description: The price provided by the merchant as entered in their catalog/price list (may be inc or ex)

entered_inclusive.description: Whether the `as_entered` price is inclusive or exclusive of tax, based on the stores tax jurisdiction

tax_exclusive.description: The estimated tax exclusive price for this product based on the provided customer group

tax_inclusive.description: The estimated tax inclusive price for this product based on the provided customer group
